oai_dc:dc.dc:title: US cartridge box plate
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Standard US Army issued oval US cartridge box plate. The plate attached to the outside flap of the infantry cartridge box. The lead filled brass plate identified the box as US property, added adornment to the leather box, and supplied additional weight to insure the flap closed properly. This example was dug in Woodbury, Tennessee.
